channel.title: EnJoy 12 V Jeep with Remote Control/Parent Override
channel.description:
If anyone has used this model, have you had issues with the steering motors?
We bought 2. One works great. Much less wiring modifications needed but one stopped working quickly.
Any insight with the steering motor would be greatly appreciated.
Thanks,

item.title: EnJoy 12 V Jeep with Remote Control/Parent Override
item.dc:creator: Joanie
item.description:
The company sent us a new steering motor (for free) and it works great.

Read full topic
item.source: EnJoy 12 V Jeep with Remote Control/Parent Override
